overview: Jenn, Lucy, Randi, and Monica all are faced with the same dilemma - to cheat, or not to cheat. With temptation at every corner, the women seek the advice of Dr. Ross whose insight into the female psyche serves as a sounding board for each woman and the decisions they must ultimately make. But, when Lucy and Dr. Ross’s attraction to one another begins to grow, they’re left wondering whether the moral high ground is worth traveling anymore.
title: Infidelity
